name: For the Love of Sophia
description:
For the Love of Sophia is a series of interactive philosophy lessons I am putting together for a philosophy 101 course I am teaching in the Spring 2018 semester. I will be adding new games/lessons to this project periodically over the next few months.

As of now, the available lessons include:

  • Zeno's Paradoxes
    • Achilles and the Tortoise
    • Max Black's Infinite Machine
  • Monty Hall
